xs.name: size_icon_xs
xs.title: Size Icon XS
xs.description: This is a x-small size for icons. Most commonly used for the caret icons inside navigation items.

s.name: size_icon_s
s.title: Size Icon S
s.description: This is a small size for icons. Most commonly used for icons inside buttons and select menu toggles.

m.name: size_icon_m
m.title: Size Icon M
m.description: This is a medium size for icons. Most commonly used for icons that sit inside large buttons.

l.name: size_icon_l
l.title: Size Icon L
l.description: This is a large size for icons. Most commonly used for illustrative purposes.

xl.name: size_icon_xl
xl.title: Size Icon XL
xl.description: This is a x-large size for icons. Most commonly used for illustrative purposes.

xxl.name: size_icon_xxl
xxl.title: Size Icon XXL
xxl.description: This is a xx-large size for icons. Most commonly used for illustrative purposes.
